answers.text:
Hi Pamela, 
We have a few resources on Knowledge Network that may help your member. 
-This is a previously answered question where local government officials weighted in on this same issue. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/22061/Telephone_and_email_response_times
-This is a copy of the email policy from the city of Beverly Hills, CA
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/14439
-Taming the e-beast is a document that goes over important things to consider when crafting an email policy for your organization. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303938
I hope your member finds these documents useful. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org
